name: Show him the light
description:
This is a story.

But this story isn't about you.
This story is about your brother, Clint.
Lately, Clint has been hiding in his room more often.
This has been unnatural of him, since he used to more social – going out often, playing with his friends, etc.
He doesn't act normal at all and you suspect his emotional health is at stake.
One day you find a calendar hung on the wall of his room.
On it was marked 24th July.
What could it mean?
What will happen on that day?
Nothing good may come out of it, so you may think.
As a responsible brother, you need to get to the bottom of this and help him!

Donate if u want lol
